Description.Text:
Position Located in Torre Pedrera in the heart of the Adriatic Riviera only 50 metres from the beach.
Restaurant Air conditioned restaurant.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment in 2001.
RESTAURANT: Sweet and salty Buffet Breakfast; Lunch and Dinner at buffet with fruit or dessert.
SERVICES: Conference room with max capacity of 800 people. The hotel has 2 swimming pools: 1 for adults and 1 for children, opening period from 01.06.14 to 07.09.14 (opening hours from 9:00 a.m. to 12:30 midday and from 2:30 p.m. to 6:30 p.m.). In addition, hotel got bocce camp free of charge,game point with table football and table tennis, baby meal point, small pine grove, volleyball camp, tennis court and football court free of charge, it is one court for all three sports!
ENTERTAINMENT from 07/06/14 to 31/08/14: Daily entertainment for Adult and children; Theme party once a week; Music party once a week; Gastronomic party once a week; miniclub open from 10 a.m. to 12 (midday) and from 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. for kids from 4 years old.
PRICES include: unlimited beverages at meals on tap (water, wine, beer, soft drinks) and open bar from 08 am to 9 pm (at the swimming pool bar) with water, wine, beer, soft drinks, fruit juices, american coffee, all on tap + main spirits (on description by the hotel). Beach service from 31/05/14 to 09/09/14 with 1 sun umbrella + 2 sun beds per room (single room 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed).
ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: Check in from 14:00 Check out by 10:00
